website_summaries.verdict: A solid model for those wishing to save a few dollars while enjoying a dish-shaped bungee chair.
pros: Comes in a gender-neutral navy blue color
Constructed with a steel frame for strength and support
Easily stowed away with retractable legs
cons: A few customers had issues with the chair's durability

customer_reviews.title: His roommate has a different brand and his is in great shape. It's not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son had this in his dorm for one month and it is destroyed. The grommets are torn and the elastic is broken. I paid more than average for this because it said it was very durable. His roommate has a different brand and his is in great shape. It's not worth the money. I told him to throw it away and I ordered a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: We like it, but it's difficult to fold
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great for poolside and beach. We bought another one like it years ago. Both are good, but the latest one we purchased is very difficult to close up. We may need some WD40. The flat panel of the seat that's surrounded by the bungie cords is important to have in order to keep from sinking too low. We once bought one with only the bungie cords with no panel and got rid of it. It's easy to bounce of of it, but be sure to use your arms on the side poles to keep it from tipping backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and sturdy. Easy to set up and close. Doesn't take up much room and folds flat. Great for kids room, video game chair, sporting event chair, teacher classroom chair etc..
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Was great, but broken 3 months later.
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year old loved this chair she received as a Christmas present. It was great for reading, playing video games, etc. But in March, the plastic bracket that holds the movable legs together broke. It’s now unusable 3 months after she received it, but of course, past the return/exchange window. Can’t find a replacement part online either. She is so disappointed. And the price went up $10 since Christmas time!
customer_reviews.author: M and J's mom

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's favorite gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson; he loved it and can't wait to show his friends. Quality product. Very sturdy and seats adult, too.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: It's actually quite comfortable for an adult as well
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this for his gaming room. It's actually quite comfortable for an adult as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Griess

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! You won’t find a better chair for the price. The kids sit it in almost everyday. It has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alison W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair very comfy. Kids love it. 5 stars, lots of fun. Great gaming chair.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a gaming chair. She absolutely loves it. I sat in it just to give it a try and was pleasantly surprised on it's comfort and the easy ability to get out of it. Great purchase. Will purchase one down the road for my other daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable, and easily stored.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to our 2, 10yr. Old granddaughters for Christmas. They were so excited! They said it was their best gift they received for Christmas. Very sturdy chair, several adults tried them & liked them as well.They easily fold up flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 4th grade classroom, broken.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a flexible seating option in my 4th grade classroom. Kids were very respectful when using it, but one of the brackets snapped off after 4 weeks or so of normal use. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming chair for kids
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find a more durable chair for gaming. Kids love it. Have purchased one for every child in the family because they all fell in love with the one I purchased for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to sit in my chair. I think I’m getting another one for my husband so he won’t stretch mine out 😋
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lineberry

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered ahead of time.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. I was given a date of arrival and the item came 3 days ahead. It was exactly what my grandchild wanted. I was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Deb K.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy and durable but for the price, not comfy enough
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Allen

customer_reviews.title: She loved her chair!
customer_reviews.text: It was for my granddaughter and she loved it, she said" the seat in the center helps you not fall through"!!
customer_reviews.author: kscon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in a classroom of 5th graders. They love it and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Sandy-winder

customer_reviews.title: Great chair !!
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair!! Surprisingly comfortable for young and old alike. Very convenient to fold and store easily. Saves room when not in use. Great gaming or reading chair.
customer_reviews.author: AlLynch

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love my bungee chair. Very comfortable and folds flat for easy carry.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: really durable but not invincible as I found out
customer_reviews.text: great but if I sit and bounce a little I fear it will fray the bottom material again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: my daughter love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and it folds up thin so you can store it easy!my daughter love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Z

product_meta.title: Zenithen IC504S-BUN3-TV1 Bungee Chair, Blue
product_meta.description: Bungee chair is manufactured with a 600d polyester rim and sturdy steel frame providing long lasting use. Features a comfortable design sure to make chair a fast favorite. Great for use at home or bring on the go. Product is available in blue and assembled dimensions are 25.98" x 32.28" x 32.68".
feature_bullets: Made with a 600D polyester rim and sturdy steel frame

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
